message:
Running command: cat > /workspace/reproduce_issue.py << 'PY'
import sys
from pathlib import Path
# Use local matplotlib in repo
sys.path.insert(0, str(Path(__file__).resolve().parents[1] / 'matplotlib' / 'lib'))
import warnings
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
from matplotlib import _api
from matplotlib import cbook
from matplotlib import __version__ as mpl_version
from matplotlib import units
from matplotlib import _api
from matplotlib.cbook import MatplotlibDeprecationWarning

# Convert Matplotlib deprecation warnings to errors to reproduce the issue
warnings.filterwarnings('error', category=MatplotlibDeprecationWarning)

print('Using matplotlib version', mpl_version)

f, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.xaxis.update_units(["a", "b"])
print('Units updated')
# This should raise MatplotlibDeprecationWarning converted to error
ax.plot([], [])
print('Plotted empty data without warning')
PY

cat > /workspace/reproduce_issue.py << 'PY'
import sys
from pathlib import Path
# Use local matplotlib in repo
sys.path.insert(0, str(Path(__file__).resolve().parents[1] / 'matplotlib' / 'lib'))
import warnings
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
from matplotlib import _api
from matplotlib import cbook
from matplotlib import __version__ as mpl_version
from matplotlib import units
from matplotlib import _api
from matplotlib.cbook import MatplotlibDeprecationWarning

# Convert Matplotlib deprecation warnings to errors to reproduce the issue
warnings.filterwarnings('error', category=MatplotlibDeprecationWarning)

print('Using matplotlib version', mpl_version)

f, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.xaxis.update_units(["a", "b"])
print('Units updated')
# This should raise MatplotlibDeprecationWarning converted to error
ax.plot([], [])
print('Plotted empty data without warning')
